amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude oil and gas leasing on any Federal lands that are viable for renewable energy production from the plan required in paragraph (1).
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude oil and gas leasing on any Federal lands that are viable for renewable energy production from the plan required in paragraph (1).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 235 (Roll no. 54).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 235 (Roll no. 54).
